name: .DDSCAN
summary: Learn about .DDSCAN files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a DDSCAN file with the macOS version of CleverFiles Disk Drill. To do so, select File â†’ Open recovery session from the app's menu bar. Then, navigate to and open your DDSCAN file.
To resume a paused scan after loading a DDSCAN file, select the Continue button. Disk Drill will then resume the scan associated with your DDSCAN file.
